items.title: Biola University, La Mirada, CA
items.subtitle: B.S. in Engineering Physics with a Computer Science Emphasis
points: Planned transfer to USC: Fall, 2022.

items.title: SSTH Summer Engineering Internship | Biola University
items.subtitle: Engineering Intern
points: In an 8-week solo project, created an automated cannulation device, currently being used by a heart disease research team.
Responsible for every aspect of the apparatus, involving an Arduino-controlled fluid routing system with an interactive graphical user interface, directed by an interrupt-driven state machine.

items.title: Inkslinger | Biola University
items.subtitle: Designer
points: Created the 2020-2021 edition of the annual Inkslinger magazine.
Created miscelaneous promotional graphics.
Wrote articles for the Inkslinger Blog.
Curated and screened submissions.

items.title: Songs for Saplings, Inc
items.subtitle: Full-Stack Web Developer
points: Built and deployed an iframe-embeddable, cloud-hosted web app from scratch for Songs for Saplings, a non-profit music organization for kids.
Matched extensive design specifications using Node.js, Express, and React.
Implemented opt-in cookies, Mixpanel usage-logging, automated digital mailing, and more.

items.title: Nanomedicine & Genomics Summer Research Internship | Biola University
items.subtitle: Frontend Web Developer
points: Created a more usable gene search experience for ORFanID, a web-based service that allows researchers and students to easily search for orphan genes.
Created functionality for screening, validating, and prettifying FASTA sequence searches.
Saved time for both the user and the backend by pre-screening bloated, invaid, or self-contradictory searches.

items.title: Solutional, Inc.
items.subtitle: Contractor
points: Bee Thinking, LLC | Used Solidworks to create accurate blueprints for artificial beehive prototypes to be used in production.
Curadite, Inc. | Created the early mockup sketches for a medical device, balancing aesthetics with feasibility.
DeepSurface Security, Inc. | Created a tool to automate market data-collection using Node.js; created motion-graphics and edited videos for the marketing team.

items.title: Starbucks
items.subtitle: Barista
points: Welcomed customers, took orders and payments.
Prepared and sold goods; cleaned; opened; and closed in multiple store locations.

items.title: Exodus Books, LLC
items.subtitle: Shipping Clerk
points: Received incoming shipments, managed inventory, prepared and processed invoices, fulfilled orders, and performed day-to-day warehouse tasks.
Took orders, reccommended products, and resolved issues via Email, by phone, and face-to-face.

items.title: McDonald's
items.subtitle: Crew Member
points: Cooked and assembled food; closed; presented at the drive-thru window and front counter.

items.title: West Union Gardens
items.subtitle: Farm Labor
points: Set up and broke down irrigation systems; harvested produce; pruned foliage.

items.title: Hard
points: Arduino programming with state-machines and interrupts.
9 years of recreational, academic, and professional programming experience (Matlab, Python, C++, Java, Rust, Javascript, HTML, CSS).
Professional front- and back-end web development experience (self-taught).
Experience with frameworks and libraries such as OpenCV, Tensorflow, NodeJS, Express, React, jQuery, threeJS, and A-Frame.
Professional experience with 3D- and 2D-CAD, 3D-printing, and lazer-cutting using Solidworks, OnShape, and Blender.

items.title: Artistic
points: Professional experienced with Adobe suite: Indesign, and Illustrator, Photoshop, Premiere Pro, and After Effects
Professional experience with graphic design, video-editing, motion-graphics, drawing, and 3D animation, especially in business and tech contexts.
Passion for music production and sound design.

items.title: Soft
points: Adaptable and capable in fast-paced, high-stress environments.
Comfortable with written communication, presentation, and public speaking.
Timely self-management of large, complex, multidisplinary projects.
Familiar with iterative engineering techniques.
